charges.charge_description: 31:5316 REPORTS ON EXPORT AND IMPORT OF MONETARY INSTRUMENTS (1)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCE: Dft committed to BofP for a term of 6 mo. Dft to receive credit for time served. Dft placed on 3 years supervised release. Standard conditions of sup release imposed plus subject to mandatory drug testing, furnish probation w/financial info and if dft deported or excluded from USA he shall no reenter USA w/o permission of INS. If dft reenters USA and intends to remain beyond brief shopping trip, dft must adivse probation w/in 72 hrs of reentry. $100 assess fee. $20, 000 fine imposed. Court recommends incarceration at Sheridan. Dft remanded (1)

charges.charge_description: For Violation of 31:5316 and 18:1001: Currency smuggling and false statements to customs [2:96-m-193]
